ques: Please organize the documents and put them in the appropriate ________.
The organization has a clear chain of ________ for decision-making.
You can ________ this document to a different file format.
The lab technician handled the ________ substances with care.
Participation in the community cleanup is ________.
Safety should always be a top ________ in any project.
The teacher had to ________ to stop the students from arguing.
Please ________ of the trash in the designated bins.
Scientists use computer models to ________ complex phenomena.
She is working on her doctoral ________ on climate change.
They decided to ________ the attic into a spare bedroom.
________ reactions can result in the formation of new compounds.
He needs to ________ the paperwork for his taxes.
The police were called to ________ in the domestic dispute.
Pilots undergo training in flight simulators to ________ real conditions.
It's important to ________ of hazardous materials properly.
She decided to offer her time as a ________ worker at the shelter.
The urgent task took precedence as the highest ________.
The professor is supervising several students' ________ projects.
In a typical company ________, the CEO is at the top.
He needs to prioritize his tasks based on their ________.
Understanding the team's ________ is essential for collaboration.
He needed to ________ of his old furniture when moving.
The factory is subject to strict regulations for handling ________ waste.
The video game allows players to ________ a virtual world.
Parents should ________ if they see their children bullying others.
The organization relies on ________ donations to support its programs.
The secretary will ________ the reports in the filing cabinet.
The defense of her master's ________ is scheduled for next week.
He plans to ________ his old car to run on electricity.
The military has a strict ________ of ranks.
________ analysis is used to identify the composition of substances.
The team discussed the order of ________ for the upcoming project.
The company must ________ of its waste in an eco-friendly manner.
The company aims to ________ raw materials into finished products.
The research ________ presents the author's findings and analysis.
Make sure to ________ the important records for easy access.
Many students engage in ________ activities to give back to society.
The United Nations may ________ in conflicts to promote peace.
The goal is to accurately ________ the behavior of the system.
She decided to ________ of unnecessary clutter in her home.
His timely ________ prevented a potential accident.
The digital ________ contains all our project documents.
The goal is to ________ sunlight into electricity using solar panels.
The students conducted experiments to study various ________ reactions.
Time management is essential for setting and meeting ________.
The ________ statement summarizes the main argument of the paper.
The simulator is used to ________ emergency situations.
Being a ________ firefighter requires dedication and commitment.
The school has a faculty ________ with department heads.
